__e: Why, yes, I... I'd like to say good-bye to you too.
Oh dear-dear what on Earth is that Mr Werp doing?
My school term's over so I'm leaving tomorrow but I wanted to say goodbye to Frank if he had a second.
Won't you at least say goodbye to her?
What spoiled an evening with Diane was having to say good night.
I'll square it with Mom, that you're not seeing her before you leave and...
We shall have the opportunity of making our adieus in the morning, I presume.
Well, sir, I might as well say farewell to you now... since I shall be departing in the morning.
Mother, I have a million things to do starting with saying goodbye to you.
It's a long time since I had anyone to say goodbye to.
All right, come on, we'll go ashore and you can say goodbye to me.
- Nice of you to take the time to see me off, Dad.
It's a long time since I had anyone to say goodbye to.
All right, come on, we'll go ashore and you can say goodbye to me.
- Nice of you to take the time to see me off, Dad.
I am not letting the guy go.
Well, you're not gonna fire me, I might as well quit. Fine.
So when are you going to talk to the guy?
I went off and left my mother and my little sister behind me.
If you'll forgive me, I would like to say goodbye... to my wife.
I know we don't have too much time... but could I have leave to say goodbye to my girl?
Could you really say good-bye, never see me again?
Give you our parting curse and see what our new ma looks like.
Then we'll say goodbye and never see you around here again. Understand?
